SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:title: Enable personal web space
SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:summary: Enables your personal webspace.\n\nJust enable this setting and push you're website to /sdcard/Android/data/com.onionchat.dr0id/files/web/[index.html]

SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:title: Message read indicator
SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:summary: By enable this option OnionChat will send a message status update to initiators once you've read his message

SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:summary: By enable this option OnionChat will forward all messages you receive via Broadcasts to all users in your contact list
